title: Cardinal Timetable
heading: Amtrak's Cardinal
bottom_text:
Local connecting trains are provided:
at New York by the MTA,
at New York and all stations in New Jersey by NJ Transit,
at Trenton, Philadelphia and Wilmington by SEPTA,
at Baltimore, BWI, and DC by the Maryland Transit Administration,
at DC and Alexandria by WMATA,
at DC and Alexandria by VRE,
and at Chicago by Metra.
